author: pipermerriam
content: Working on a formalized announcement with everything written down in a document... but we have reached an agreement across all client teams to drop pre merge bodies and receipts on may 1st 2025.

author: sky.cactus
content: There are going to be some "decentralized" apps that will break with this, probably a good idea to use it as an opportunity to tell app developers that unlike storage, receipts are not forever and if you want to store something permanently on-chain you need to use storage.

author: pipermerriam
content:
This won't necessarily mean that JSON-RPC can't or wont return this data.  Each client will be free to implement this as they please.  I expect the common routes will be:

- Return error on missing data
- Fetch data on demand from Portal for those that participate in that network.
- Ability to run client in "full history" mode, pulling a full history of block data to disk from either ERA, portal, torrents, etc.
